verbose_text: Altogether, these observations demonstrate that when expressed with endogenous Cx46, the cysless mutant, which has been shown to have the greatest effect on cell-cell communication, also had the greatest effect on CSC maintenance compared to the other mutants (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) and led us to conclude that GJIC mediated by Cx46 is essential to maintain GBM CSC proliferation, survival, and self-renewal.
